SEARCH
Module JNewton
Package crab.newton

Class NewtonCollision

java.lang.Object
crab.newton.NewtonCollision
public final class NewtonCollision extends Object
NewtonCollision relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • NewtonCollision refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentScope.
Programs can only use NewtonCollision when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
